tool.name: Get a PubMed document
tool.help:
**What it does**
Retrieves a single document from either the PubAnnotation PubMed corpus or the PubMed Centrlal corpus.
If the *Project* field is specfied all the annotations from the specified project will be retreived and the *Type* field is ignored. If no *Project* is selected
Use the *Type* field to specify is annotations should be included. **Note** that all annotations from all projects will be included in the output. Select *Text only* to retreive just the text content for the selected document.
When the LIF/JSON output format is selected (the default) the PubAnnotation JSON document will be the value of the *payload* field in a LIF container. Otherwise the plain PubAnnotation JSON document will be loaded.
.. class:: infomark
**NOTE:** You can find a list of the PubMed documents available via PubAnnotation `here <http://pubannotation.org/docs/sourcedb/PubMed>`_
The 10 largest PubMed documents are:
* 10022392 * 0025722 * 10024663 * 10024661 * 10024662 * 10022882 * 10025864 * 10022664 * 10025862 * 10025748
